column4: Hi, I want to remap my keys; are there any GUI utilities to do it?
you want to remap what the alt key does?
i hate the alt key because its used by apps i like and the WM i use
...Did I ask this before? Because it's creepy that the answer is yes
no i just have the same problem and am looking for the same solution
Hm, try xkeycaps, it MIGHT work for you. You have to make it load on startup though
It might not work because the keyboard layouts for it are very old
the laptop is about 1.5 years old
The keyboards the utility are at least 10 years old
when do you think keyboards were last remapped
Well, you can remap your keyboard anytime lol. The last year it was supported though was 2000
